Who: RODIMUS PRIME, LEGACY, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Perceptor,
Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - Hole/chamber beneath hallway

Rodimus listened as Tuscon spoke, the Bot had so much confidence and
conviction in his voice.

"Once we get back up into the upper levels I will know my way around."
Rodimus said as he shined his light around. "For now it is just a
matter of getting ourselves out of here.

> "What now Autobot"said Perceptor rudely to Tucson"I want to leave this place
> as much as you, and it isnt good for my reputation been seen chatting with
> you; shall we leave this place now or not? I dont need your map, I know
> every single rock in this place... So are we leaving or not?"

"We leave." Rodimus said as he glanced back at the others. "We will
follow you." Rodimus said to Perceptor. "I am sure that we can keep up
with you easily enough."

Rodimus looked back at Perceptor, "We have gotten to know each other
quite well in the past few months." Rodimus said to him, "I would
welcome you among the Maximals." Rodimus lowered his weapon slightly,
"As long as you're straight with us."

"Kup!" Rodimus said over the radio, "We will be heading in your
direction soon. Be prepared to give Tuscon his sonar back, he will
need it."

(TAG)

Preston
